attributes.action: introduce legislations to change the rules so that votes cast at local and national elections in this country are done so anonymously.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been disenfranchised from involvement in voting for who runs this country because I am not prepared to cast a vote as long as I cannot do so anonymously.  Even in the 3rd world people don't have a link between who they are, where they live and how they vote.  There is continuing and rapidly building evidence that corrupted party political activitists are using this information to the detriment of voters rights and the rules must be changed so that we go back to being able to vote without having a record of what we voted put into the hands of people who cannot be trusted not to misuse the information at any and every opportunity.
